assistant_id.description: The assistant ID or graph name to run. If using graph name, will default to first assistant created from that graph.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: A value to pass to an interrupted node.

anyOf.title: Send
anyOf.description: A message to send to a node.

node.title: Node
node.description: The node to send the message to.

items.title: Send
items.description: A message to send to a node.

node.title: Node
node.description: The node to send the message to.

goto.title: Goto
goto.description: Name of the node(s) to navigate to next or node(s) to be executed with a provided input.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Metadata to assign to the run.

context.title: Context
context.description: Static context added to the assistant.

webhook.title: Webhook
webhook.description: Webhook to call after LangGraph API call is done.

interrupt_before.title: Interrupt Before
interrupt_before.description: Nodes to interrupt immediately before they get executed.

interrupt_after.title: Interrupt After
interrupt_after.description: Nodes to interrupt immediately after they get executed.

feedback_keys.title: Feedback Keys
feedback_keys.description: Feedback keys to assign to run.

stream_subgraphs.title: Stream Subgraphs
stream_subgraphs.description: Whether to stream output from subgraphs.

stream_resumable.title: Stream Resumable
stream_resumable.description: Whether to persist the stream chunks in order to resume the stream later.

on_completion.title: On Completion
on_completion.description: Whether to delete or keep the thread created for a stateless run. Must be one of 'delete' or 'keep'.

on_disconnect.title: On Disconnect
on_disconnect.description: The disconnect mode to use. Must be one of 'cancel' or 'continue'.

after_seconds.title: After Seconds
after_seconds.description: The number of seconds to wait before starting the run. Use to schedule future runs.

checkpoint_during.title: Checkpoint During
checkpoint_during.description: Whether to checkpoint during the run.

durability.title: Durability
durability.description: Durability level for the run. Must be one of 'sync', 'async', or 'exit'.

title: RunBatchCreate
description: Payload for creating a batch of runs.
